name: Finger Isolations
description: Develop precision control over individual fingers for complex tutting and gloving sequences.

cards.title: Wave Isolation
cards.description: Control each finger independently to create seamless wave-like effects.
bulletpoints: Move fingers in a controlled sequence
Ensure smooth motion between each joint
Practice slow-to-fast transitions for illusion effect
cards.summaryText: Chain finger waves joint by joint for silky gloving illusions.

cards.title: Knuckle Rolls
cards.description: Use knuckle-based finger rolls to create advanced illusionary effects.
bulletpoints: Focus on creating a fluid rolling effect
Combine with wrist movements for added complexity
cards.summaryText: Roll knuckles in sequence and layer wrist turns to amplify the effect.
